hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: Uses this product, may exempt builds the scaffold.
sentences.chinese: 使用本產品，可免搭腳手架。

sentences.english: Cable-net curtain wall will be erected under the cooperation of indoor and outdoor scaffoldings.
sentences.chinese: 索網幕牆通過室內外腳手架配合進行安裝。

sentences.english: Arch bridge can be constructed over a falsework , or temporary scaffolding.
sentences.chinese: 曲拱橋樑可以被修建在腳手架或者臨時腳手架。

sentences.english: Arch bridge can be constructed over a falsework , or temporary scaffolding.
sentences.chinese: 曲拱橋樑可以被修建在腳手架或者臨時腳手架。

sentences.english: He had stopped to lean on a scaffold to drink beer from a “tall boy” can wrapped in a brown bag.
sentences.chinese: 中途他停下來靠在腳手架上，喝着一大瓶啤酒。

sentences.english: e pulled out his level and put it on the scaffold to show that the scaffold was level.
sentences.chinese: 於是承包商拿出水平儀放在腳手架上說明這是水平的。

sentences.english: Products to the scaffolding, bowls clasp, row grid tubes, steel formwork.
sentences.chinese: 產品以腳手架，碗扣，排柵管，鋼模板。

sentences.english: The painters set up a scaffold to work on while painting the building.
sentences.chinese: 畫工們在這個建築物上搭了一個腳手架畫畫。

sentences.english: A connector for building is composed of plug and socket.
sentences.chinese: 一種新式建築用接插件，多用於支撐結構和腳手架中。

sentences.english: The workmen rigged up some tubular scaffolding at once.
sentences.chinese: 工人們立刻搭了個管子腳手架。

sentences.english: Use scaffolding to safely drywall your remodeled garage.
sentences.chinese: 使用腳手架安全地砌牆的改建車庫。

sentences.english: The method of securing the scaffolding and plant shall be to the Jianli's approval.
sentences.chinese: 腳手架和設備的架設方法須經監理同意。

sentences.english: The services of the Scaffolding Erectors Kent are second to none.
sentences.chinese: 腳手架的成型機肯特郡的服務都是首屈一指的。

sentences.english: Our company is building scaffolding products and fastening products manufacturing enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 我公司是腳手架產品和建築扣件產品生產製造企業。

sentences.english: Emin's father constructed the wooden trestle sitting amongst the potted plants.
sentences.chinese: 翠西的父親親手製作了那立在花盆中的腳手架。

sentences.english: Scaffolding surrounds the walls of Neuschwanstein Castle as it is being constructed, seen about 1875.
sentences.chinese: 正在興建之中的新天鵝堡，堡四周圍上了腳手架。

definition: floor/floor (ie. metal plate, concrete slab, wooden planking etc)
